field.name: Not Trained to Provide HIV Testing and Counseling | Take Action
Check Child Health Record “green” book and mother’s HIV status
If mother has confirmed HIV infection and child’s HIV status is unknown:
Counsel mother/caregiver to get child tested for HIV at nearby health facility
Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
If child has confirmed HIV infection:
Refer mother/caregiver to take child to ART centre to get counseling and receive ARVs
Educate mother on the importance of having her child and herself taking ARVs regularly
Counsel client to exclusively breastfeed her child, and explain the harms of mixed feeding during the first 6 months
Follow-up with the mother and child after they have visited the ART centre
Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
